attributes.action: Help aid in the reinstatement of Big Ron Atknison to his position as commentator in Champions League matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since Big Ron was given the sack football fans across the world are missing out in classic quotes such as "It's like a toaster, the ref's shirt pocket. Every time there's a tackle, up pops a yellow card. I'm talking metaphysically now of course."
 and "The ref was vertically 15 yards away. He has a moustache."
The youth of today should not have to be restricted from the babblings of the man who invented the wide awake club. Therefore I petition you to bring back Big Ron. His one little racist mistake should not be held against him and deprive the rest of us with quality entertainment. Bring back Ron.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
